 */const sizePattern=/col(_(\d|auto){1,2}){2,}/;const translatePrefix=prefix=>{switch(prefix&&prefix.toLowerCase()){case'large':return'lg';case'medium':return'md';case'small':return'sm';case'xsmall':default:return'';}};export const getColumnSizes=(config,size)=>{if(!sizePattern.exec(config)){return false;}const cols=config.split('_').slice(1);const translatedSize=translatePrefix(size);const sizePrefix=translatedSize&&"-".concat(translatedSize)||'';return cols.map(colWidth=>"col".concat(sizePrefix,"-").concat(colWidth));};export const showErrors=context=>{const{isDebug,isEditor}=context&&context.request&&context.request.params||{};return!!isDebug||!!isEditor;};export const getColClassArray=options=>[options.xsmall&&getColumnSizes(options.xsmall),options.small&&getColumnSizes(options.small,'small'),options.medium&&getColumnSizes(options.medium,'medium'),options.large&&getColumnSizes(options.large,'large')].filter(Boolean);export const colWidths=new Map([['one','col-md-1'],['two','col-md-2'],['three','col-md-3'],['four','col-md-4'],['six','col-md-6'],['twelve','col-md-12']]);
